text: "Do You Really Want to Hurt Me" is a 1982 song by English new wave band Culture Club. It was taken from their debut studio album Kissing to Be Clever. It topped the single charts in the United Kingdom, Germany, Australia, Canada, Sweden, France, Switzerland, Austria, Belgium and Denmark. It also went to number 2 in the Netherlands, the United States and New Zealand. It was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1984. ==Track listings== * 7-inch :A. "Do You Really Want to Hurt Me" – 4:22 :B.
